title: The Unlawful Possession of Property Act
title_en: The Unlawful Possession of Property Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-unlawful-possession-of-property-act | Legal areas: Criminal Procedures

provisions.title: Section 6
provisions.content:
6. Power of constable or aut.horized person on reasonable cause
      for belief.

provisions.title: Section 10
provisions.content:
10. Trial of person brought before Resident Magistrate under sections
      8 and 9.

provisions.title: Section 13
provisions.content:
13. Penalty for assaulting, etc., constables, authorized persons and
     their assistants.

provisions.title: Section 14
provisions.content:
14. Power to vary Schedule.

           UNLAWFUL POSSESSION OF PROPERTY

  white                              Paddy
